name: TELEWEAPONS
description:
A simple game about pushing boxes !

~20 minutes of playtime ? 

7 tutorial levels + 9 levels 

CONTROLS :

  • WASD / Arrow Key to move
  • Escape to see the menu
  • Z to undo
  • R to reset the level
  • Navigate the menu with your mouse
  • T to show the number of moves you made. If you finished the game, try to complete the levels with the minimum number of moves !

Have fun !
